name: invoice_custom
description: Custom invoice extraction template with detailed line items
prompt: Extract comprehensive invoice information including vendor details, customer information, line items with descriptions and amounts, tax information, and payment terms. Preserve exact text and provide meaningful attributes.

examples.text:
INVOICE #2024-INV-001
Bill To: Acme Corporation
123 Business St, Suite 100
Business City, BC 12345

From: TechSupply Solutions
456 Vendor Ave
Supply Town, ST 67890
Phone: (555) 123-4567
Email: billing@techsupply.com

Invoice Date: March 15, 2024
Due Date: April 15, 2024
Terms: Net 30

Description                 Qty    Unit Price    Amount
Laptop Computer Dell XPS    2      $1,299.99     $2,599.98
Wireless Mouse Logitech     2      $29.99        $59.98
Software License Office     1      $149.99       $149.99

Subtotal:                                         $2,809.95
Tax (8.5%):                                       $238.85
Shipping:                                         $25.00
Total Amount Due:                                 $3,073.80

attributes.address: 123 Business St, Suite 100, Business City, BC 12345
